languages.text: Каждая успешная {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}атака в ближнем бою{/g} дает +1 уровень эффекта "виртуоз клинка". Каждый уровень на 20% увеличивает {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, наносимый в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}.
languages.original_text: Each successful {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee attack{/g} grants 1 stack of the blade artist {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} which increases the {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}hit chance{/g} against melee targets by +20% per stack.

traits.locale_text: Каждая успешная {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}атака в ближнем бою{/g} дает +1 уровень эффекта "виртуоз клинка". Каждый уровень повышает {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}шанс попадания{/g} по целям в ближнем бою на 20%.

Каждая успешная {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}атака в ближнем бою{/g} дает +1 уровень эффекта "виртуоз клинка". Каждый уровень повышает {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}шанс попадания{/g} по целям в ближнем бою на 20%.

languages.text: Each successful {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} grants +1 stack of the blade artist effect which increases melee {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} by +20% per stack.
languages.original_text: Каждая успешная {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}атака в ближнем бою{/g} дает +1 уровень эффекта "виртуоз клинка". Каждый уровень на 20% увеличивает {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, наносимый в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Each successful {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee attack{/g} grants +1 stack of the blade artist effect which increases melee damage by +20% per stack.
Each successful {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} grants +1 stack of the blade artist effect which increases melee {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} by +20% per stack.

languages.text: 每当此生物使用{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}击中目标时，都会获得1层“利刃大师”{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}，每层效果可以使近战{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高20%
languages.original_text: Each successful {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} grants +1 stack of the blade artist {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} which increases melee {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} by +20% per stack.

traits.locale_text: 每当此生物使用{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近战攻击{/g}击中目标时，都会获得1层“利刃大师”{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}，每层效果可以使对近战目标的{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}命中率{/g}提高20%。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}が成功するたびにブレードアーティストの{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}を1スタック与える。これはスタックごとに近接{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を+20％上げる。
languages.original_text: Each successful {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} grants +1 stack of the blade artist {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} which increases melee {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} by +20% per stack.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近接攻撃{/g}が成功するたびにブレードアーティストの{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}を1スタック与える。これはスタックごとに近接ターゲットに対する{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}命中率{/g}を+20％上げる。

languages.text: Todos los {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} que impacten otorgan 1 acumulación del {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} artista de la espada, que aumenta el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} cuerpo a cuerpo un +20 % por acumulación.
languages.original_text: Each successful {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} grants +1 stack of the blade artist {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} which increases melee {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} by +20% per stack.

traits.locale_text: Todos los {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} que impacten otorgan 1 acumulación del {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} artista de la espada, que aumenta la {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}probabilidad de impacto{/g} contra objetivos cuerpo a cuerpo en +20 % por acumulación.

languages.text: Jeder erfolgreiche {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} gewährt +1 Stapel des Effekts Klingenkünstler, der den Nahkampf-{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} um +20 % pro Stapel erhöht.
languages.original_text: Each successful {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} grants +1 stack of the blade artist effect which increases melee {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} by +20% per stack.

traits.locale_text: Jeder erfolgreiche {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Nahkampfangriff{/g} gewährt 1 Mal den aufaddierbaren {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} Klingenkünstler, der die {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}Trefferchance{/g} gegen Nahkampfziele um +20% pro aufaddiertem Effekt erhöht.

languages.text: Chaque {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} réussie confère +1 cumul de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} Artiste des Lames, ce qui augmente les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de mêlée de +20 % par cumul.
languages.original_text: Each successful {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} grants +1 stack of the blade artist {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} which increases melee {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} by +20% per stack.

traits.locale_text: Chaque {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}attaque de mêlée{/g} réussie confère 1 cumul de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} Artiste des Lames, ce qui augmente de +20 % par cumul les {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}chances d'infliger un coup{/g} aux cibles lors des combat de mêlée.
